name: H Chan: Girl
description:
This is a fantastic game, Support for extended images, Dynamic picture, Get more fun from the picture !

F key to complete the puzzle quickly
Right mouse button automatic touch
Esc key setting interface, you can adjust touch range R, touch intensity S, touch elasticity E

Game Features

  • Extended picture
  • Dynamic picture
  • Jigsaw puzzle
  • Graffiti function
  • Touch interaction
